Title: Morphing
Description: Morphing is a simple graphics editor providing morphing of images by warping method and creation of simple animations.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Morphing is a simple graphics editor providing morphing of images by warping method and creation of simple animations.


Features
  • multilingual GUI
  • realtime image morphing
  • intuitive GUI
  • export to animated gif (using NGIF: http://www.codeproject.com/KB/GDI-plus/NGif.aspx)
  • drag&drop support

Requirements:
  • Microsoft .NET Framework 3.0

Known issues:
  • timeline is limited to 200 frames
  • transformations of shapes are buggy
  • only Czech language currently available

Todo:
